text:
"Hello,

My HubSpot account has been disabled but my Google Ads campaigns keep receiving API calls from it and I cannot disable it. Can you maybe fix this from your end?"

<@U01QVR44MEY> When I went to sleep I had time to think, and I told myself that I should try to send the request with Zapier webhooks instead of the HubSpot action 'API Request (Beta) in HubSpot' ! And so now I know that it will work :raised_hands: Thank you so much ! :slightly_smiling_face:
Does anyone know if it's possible to create pop-up windows, other than forms, in HubSpot cms? I'm keen to create a popup window with an iframe
Hi <@U05432W8HFT>, yes, it's possible to create a popup with an iframe - this would require a custom solution, it's not a native tool within the CMS
Hi. I want to reduce the size of the logo for mobile on the subscription page. I used media queries but it does'n't seem to work. Anyone know a workaround for that

Hello guys,
I'm facing an issue with the non-HubSpot form.
I have a external form in my website and using the HubSpot tracking code to collect the data but when i do not have any class or id in the form element. it still collect data and store it into Unidentified Form.

Can anyone help me to prevent collecting data if there's no class or id in form element.
thanks!

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report.a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.
I wanted to give you an update that the client decided to hack together a solution using SQL and a WordPress site.
ok, now the client has another issue. They need to be able to link children to parent's. We were proposing using companies, but since families do not have domains that didn't seem like it would work.
We were wondering if using a custom object to create a family entity would work.
Yeah what I do is create a student (child) object and then associate that to the contacts.
Another option is to create a custom object called family, and then associate the students to that and then associate the parents to the family
The problem with this though is that it's pretty hard to send emails to parents based on things that happen to the student record because you can't send them through workflows
(because the contact isn't directly associated)
I think we are only sending updates to the parent for the program, not report cards or anything like that.
of course
So they will only have one-off communication with parents (i.e. your kid didn't show up for class).
knowing that, I think the custom object will work

I feel like there's not a great spot for this question, maybe we need an "analytics" channel?

I know that HubSpot automatically places the tracking script on a HubSpot site. In my current situation (which is a company utilizing a 3rd party cookie management tool), this is very troublesome... because I can't control the location of the tracking script placed on the page. Is there any way to override the automatic placement of HubSpot's tracking script? Can GTM solve this?
These DNS records should’ve been updated a couple of days ago, but I have seen these notices for week(s) now. Will HubSpot automatically detect the new records, or do I need to do something else?

not sure where to put this/ask so apologize if this is a dumb Q: partner and I want to create a chrome extension that can integrate with our HubSpot client database. Effectively, if we update info in the CRM it will automatically update on the extension. I'm v non-technical (lol) was wondering if this is possible. ty.

I have already registered users on my platform, and now I want to provide the service that will let my users post on their social media accounts using my platform, is there a way I can use HubSpot service?
